segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number and the further specification of the message type (in data element 1001: Document/message name, coded), such as Gate-in report, Gate-out report.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information, such as: - change information

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message, such as: - reference to previous message - container announcement reference number

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to indicate information relating to the main carriage stage of the transport (sea).

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate transport details related to the main carriage stage of the transport (sea), such as carrier/liner service.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to provide a reference for the liner service, such as: - conference - marketing organization - syndicate - vessel sharing agreement

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a place/port corresponding to the main carriage stage.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate a date/time relating to the main carriage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify a party and/or addresses and related contacts.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name and address, and function, such as: - message recipient - message sender - ordering customer - ordering customer agent

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department of a message sender and/or message recipient, such as: - information contact

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to describe the goods items (to be) stuffed in or (to be) stripped from the containers.

segment.name: Goods item details
segment.documentation: GID, A segment to identify a goods item (to be) stuffed in or (to be) stripped from the containers.

segment.name: Handling instructions
segment.documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions relating to the goods item, such as: - hazardous cargo - off-dimensions - Customs clearance

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to describe the goods item or to provide special instructions.

segment.name: Additional product id
segment.documentation: PIA, A segment to identify a commodity code.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify a measurement, other than dimensions, for the goods item.

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to specify a temperature setting for a goods item.

segment.name: Range details
segment.documentation: RNG, A segment to specify a temperature range setting for a goods item.

segment.name: Split goods placement
segment.documentation: SGP, A segment to identify a container in which goods are transported.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item. One goods item may be in different dangerous goods classes.

segment.name: Dangerous goods
segment.documentation: DGS, A segment to indicate the dangerous goods regulations for the corresponding mode of transport, class of dangerous goods, additional dangerous goods code, UN-number and shipment flash point.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify supplementary details related to the dangerous goods, such as: - dangerous goods technical name - dangerous goods additional information

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: SG7-NAD A group of segments to specify containers in which goods are transported.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to specify a container, container size and type used in the transport, and full/empty indication.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify the identifying number associated with the container, such as: - container sequence number - booking reference number (sea)

segment.name: Transport movement details
segment.documentation: TMD, A segment to indicate a Full Container Load (FCL) or a Less than Full Container Load (LCL).

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to pick-up and delivery of a container, such as: - actual equipment collection/pick-up date/time - actual delivery date/time

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify ports/locations associated with the transport of a container, such as: - stowage cell - place of discharge

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurement, other than dimensions, associated with the container, such as: - gross weight

segment.name: Dimensions
segment.documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions applicable to the container, such as: - external equipment dimensions

segment.name: Seal number
segment.documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seal and seal issuer associated with the container, such as shipper, consolidator, carrier (sea), Customs or terminal operator.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information associated with the container, such as: - damage remarks

segment.name: Attached equipment
segment.documentation: EQA, A segment to identify related container and means of transport details (rail), such as: - rail car

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify damage details related to the equipment.

segment.name: Damage
segment.documentation: DAM, A segment to specify equipment damages, such as the point of the damage on the equipment, and the type of damage.

segment.name: Component details
segment.documentation: COD, A segment to specify component details of the damaged equipment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to indicate details of the movement of containers by sea and by inland carriers, such as mode and means of transport and locations.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to the inland transport stage (road, rail or inland water), such as mode of transport, identification of the means of transport and inland carrier.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify ports/locations associated with inland transport of a container, such as: - place of departure - place of arrival

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date/time relating to the transport details, such as arrival or departure date/time.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify the actual address where a piece of euqipment is to be delivered finally (final place of positioning).

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment to specify the number of containers in the message,.
